# Frost Weapon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of water)

**Range:** Touch

**Area:** Weapon touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless, object)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 95

You imbue a weapon with icy cold, granting it a power similar to the *[[Frost (MagWpnSpcAb)|frost]]* special ability. A frost weapon deals an extra 1d6 points of cold damage on a successful hit. If cast on a bow, crossbow, or sling, the spell bestows the cold energy upon the weaponâ€™s ammunition. This ability stacks with the *[[Frost (MagWpnSpcAb)|frost]]* special ability, but not with itself.
